title: Graduation Rates Rise, Achievement Gap Narrows (America's Promise Alliance)
text: ( Source : America's Promise Alliance ) States are increasing their graduation rates and narrowing the achievement gap for students of color, students with disabilities, low-income students and English language learners , according to
